features: Effective eye care for men: Formulated with 98.7% naturally-derived ingredients to visibly reduce dark circles and puffiness - for a refreshed and energized look
Advanced anti-fatigue treatment: The metal applicator provides an instant cooling effect, decongesting the under-eye area for smoother skin
Deep hydration and nourishment: This moisturising eye cream softens the delicate eye area, helping to reduce signs of fatigue
Unscented, vegan and free from silicones: Gentle, non-irritating formula suitable for sensitive skin and all other skin types
Easy to use: Apply daily to clean skin, massage with the metal applicator, then gently pat until fully absorbed - for morning and/or evening use
